text:

Every day we offer FREE licensed software you’d have to buy otherwise. $9.95 Giveaway of the day — Scadarlia 1.1.2 Scadarlia - New approach to search engines using. User rating: 0 (0%) 0 (0%) Leave a comment 
Scadarlia 1.1.2 is available as a Giveaway of the day! You have limited time to download and install it. Download Now Scadarlia 1.1.2 Terms and conditions 
Nothing is as boring as clicking on a search result only to find that it doesn’t have what you are looking for. This forces many people to roll in and out of the Search Engine Result Pages in search of what you are looking for. Scardalia brings a different concept into the picture. The browser like app gives a way to annotate different search results giving you an idea of what you are opening long before you click on the link. Important note: People often miss the killer feature of this app: fast transition to a wanted paragraph. To get it you should click on a paragraph on popup window. System Requirements: 
Windows 7/ 8/ 8.1/ 10 Publisher:
